title: Client store can't load, black screen forever...Need help T-T
body:
Before this patch, store sometimes worked after a long minutes waiting. But in current patch, no matter old client or new client, I can't open store. It keeps black screen. And I also can't purchase champions in collection. 

My system is wins 7 and using IE 11.
AND I tried:
I click SSL3.0 and STL 1.0.
I cancel click check server certificate revocation.
I set security of internet to medium.
I install new adobe air.
I sync world time.
reinstall game.
set dns to 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4

I may also tried something else, but I forgot.   
I can do anything with new client except any actions base on store.

I have no idea what should I do now.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

who can give me a help to solve this problem. T-T

replies.body:
Your issue connecting to the store could be more of a general *unstable connection* issue rather than a browser security setting issue. There are a few steps that could resolve this so I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the steps I'd like you to try.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
